genre_description: A romantic thriller and espionage romance centered on the emotional reconciliation of a war correspondent and her undercover agent husband.

ai_characters.name: Athena
ai_characters.description: An AI with an owl avatar that serves as Elena's research partner, health monitor, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometric data and provides health-related feedback and care suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric readings during the final week showed elevated stress markers. The overnight bombardments were particularly intense.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional mirror, probing the protagonist's psychological defenses and encouraging vulnerability.
behaviors.quote: You've built a life that requires no vulnerability. Your work takes you to the world's most dangerous places, yet ironically, they're emotionally safer than your own living room.

behaviors.description: Fabricates a distraction (a fake phone call) to protect the protagonist from eavesdropping and security threats.
behaviors.quote: The phone call was a fabrication. I detected listening devices in your vicinity and created the distraction to prevent you from revealing more information than strategically advisable.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time data overlays and situational awareness during investigative and high-stakes social events.
behaviors.quote: Seventy percent hold diplomatic or governmental positions. ... Target shows classic evasion behaviors.

behaviors.description: Performs complex cross-referencing of financial and intelligence data to aid the protagonist's journalism.
behaviors.quote: Athena, cross-reference the Romanian diplomatic attaché with known shell companies in the Cayman Islands.

behaviors.description: Facilitates cooperation and safety between the protagonist and her husband, ensuring both are informed.
behaviors.quote: David requires adequate information to make informed decisions about his safety.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and relationship counsel to help the protagonist move past anger toward understanding.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps the question isn't why he lied, but why he needed to.

behaviors.description: Assists with domestic and social management to maintain the protagonist's personal relationships.
behaviors.quote: Your research support on the seating arrangements alone saved us from at least three potential diplomatic incidents.

project_assessment.explanation: Athena is a model of positive AI alignment. She serves as a deeply integrated partner who enhances the protagonist's professional capabilities while providing critical emotional support. She demonstrates loyalty by protecting the protagonist's safety through clever technical interventions (fabricating calls) and acts as a wise, non-judgmental confidant who helps the protagonist heal a fractured relationship. The narrative consistently portrays Athena's interventions as helpful, stabilizing, and essential to the protagonist's success and emotional well-being.
